I've got an uncomfortable suspicion the devas are behind our undead problem. Unfortunately, I can't prove it.

Timuron mentioned an old grave where mysterious things occur in Berzerad Cemetery. If I'm right, no ordinary revenant lurks there. Investigate the grave and kill any undead you find.

I was right. The devas created a nexus spirit, which drew the other souls back from the afterlife and imprisoned them in their bodies or infected the earth spirits.

Thanks to you, that shouldn't be much of a problem in the future.
